channel.title: Shop Trading Problem
channel.description: I have a problem that when i try to trade or talk to my shopNPC's Nothing happens. The NPC's show up and walk around but i can't trade or talk to them! I NEED HELP ON HOW TO FIX IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I have a problem that when i try to trade or talk to my shopNPC’s
Nothing happens.
The NPC’s show up and walk around but i can’t trade or talk to them!
I NEED HELP ON HOW TO FIX IT!!!
